name: SHADOW OF A MAN Open Edition

metadata.name: Shadow Of A Man
metadata.description:
In shadow, life lives.   
In much of my work, I find myself in a deep dive into shadows and how they tell their own mysterious story. I also allude to how these shadows hold a deeper meaning, often implying how I identify with living abroad and the conflicts that come from change. 
But, at the end of the day..they just look so good! 
This is a compliment to my recently released collection "Life In Shadow".  
Enjoy!

Title: Shadow Of A Man

Artist: ERIK WITSOE

Dimensions: 3120 x 4680

Location: Warsaw, Poland 

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by holder of the NFT, as long as creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with creator.
